items.title: 11.9.0 compatability update!
items.content: Next update (v5.2.4) will include huge improvements to styles generation: utility classes CSS only loaded if used on page, eg: if your blocks will have a specific utility class (mb-5, shadow, rounded etc).

items.title: 11.8.0 compatability update!
items.content: Gutenberg 11.8 introduced some major changes so WeCodeArt 5.1.5+ will align with those updates - please update to latest version.

items.title: Is a FSE beta - have patience!
items.content: WeCodeArt version 5.0 is a Full Site Editing theme which means it will have API changes - please have patience and do not use on production!

items.title: Version 5.0 is now live!
items.content: Enjoy the new powerfull version 5.0 - bringing CSS generation for Gutenberg Blocks, Gutenberg Blocks with Bootstrap markup and tons more. Enjoy!
